titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Secretary of the Senate in Humphrey, et al. v. Baker, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/18/1987--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Secretary of the Senate in the case of Gordon J. Humphrey, et al. v. James A. Baker, III, et al.
